content.query:
--check empty lname and fname if empty count empty rows with lname and fname

SELECT 
sum ( case when fname is null then 1 else 0 end ) fname_empty_cnt,
sum ( case when lname is null then 1 else 0 end ) lname_empty_cnt
 FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
;

SELECT count(*)
 FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
where fname is null and lname is null;

--check if adderesses and zip are empty cout empty rows
SELECT 
sum ( case when address is null then 1 else 0 end ) add1_empty_cnt,
sum ( case when address2 is null then 1 else 0 end ) add2_empty_cnt,
sum ( case when address3 is null then 1 else 0 end ) add3_empty_cnt,
sum ( case when address4 is null then 1 else 0 end ) add4_empty_cnt,
sum ( case when address6 is null then 1 else 0 end ) add6_empty_cnt,
sum ( case when zip is null then 1 else 0 end ) zip_empty_cnt
FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
 
;



SELECT hash_id, count(*)
 FROM [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
where address4 is null 
group by hash_id
having count(*)>1;
